title: One Bite Cheese Bread
directions: 1. Put all ingredients (A) into kneading bowl. Knead to form dough. Add margarine and continue knead to form smooth and elastic dough. Cover and let it prove for 1 hour 15 minutes or double its size.
2. Transfer to working surface. Slightly knead to remove excess bubbles. Shape into ball and leave to rest for 10 minutes.
3. Roll out the ball into rectangle shape (about 1 cm thick). Cut into small squares (about 2cm x 2cm). Transfer onto greased baking pan. Leave to rest for 45 minutes.
4. Bake at 180C for 12-14 minutes. Remove and cool on wire rack.
